entry.title: Datepicker
entry.content:
bootstrap-datepicker

gem 'bootstrap-datepicker-rails'

<%= form_tag items_path, method: :get do %>
  <%= text_field_tag :q, nil, placeholder:Time.now.localtime.strftime("%m/%d/%Y"), 'data-provide':'datepicker' %>
  <%= submit_tag %>
<% end %>

entry.title: Counter-cache
entry.content:
$rails g migration add_votes_to_store

def self.up
    add_column :stores, :votes_count, :integer, :default => 0
end

#model vote

class Vote < ActiveRecord::Base
    belongs_to :store, :counter_cache => true
end

#view
<%= store.votes_count %>
